verses.name: Job 34:2
verses.text: Hear my words, O ye wise men; and give ear unto me, ye that have knowledge.

verses.name: Job 34:3
verses.text: For the ear trieth words, as the mouth tasteth meat.

verses.name: Job 34:4
verses.text: Let us choose to us judgment: let us know among ourselves what is good.

verses.name: Job 34:5
verses.text: For Job hath said, I am righteous: and God hath taken away my judgment.

verses.name: Job 34:6
verses.text: Should I lie against my right? my wound is incurable without transgression.

verses.name: Job 34:7
verses.text: What man is like Job, who drinketh up scorning like water?

verses.name: Job 34:8
verses.text: Which goeth in company with the workers of iniquity, and walketh with wicked men.
